name: Fable Rush
description:
Explore hardcore match3 in our new game Fable Rush!Game features


  • vivid graphics
  • exciting plot
  • no donation
  • achievements

The fantasy world needs you, Hero! Free the magical land from the enemy and show who the real hero is! Reveal your strength and skills in this amazing match3. Wise wizards will guide you on your quest and help you find the way.
Fable Rush is your chance to immerse into the fabulous world of adventures. Beat the enemy and become the winner. With your wits, magic and strength, the enemy has no chance! Fantasy is closer than you think. Buy the game and fight the evil forces. Although simple, this match3 will strike you with its magical plot and vivid graphics!

Don’t waste a minute! Go and save the fantasy world!
